Title: Sleeping Beauty
Actors: Bridgette Barrett, Rachael Blake, Hannah Bella Bowden, Emily Browning
Plot: Lucy is a university student who is working a number of jobs. She volunteers at a research lab, works at a coffee shop, and as a photocopy clerk in an office. She responds to an advertisement and embarks on an erotic freelance job in which she is required to sleep in bed alongside paying customers.
